game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins
game.description: Deep within the forest, a forgotten ruin lies hidden. Rumors have it that an ancient artifact is kept there. Your task is to retrieve this artifact.

task.description: The ruins are located deep within the Eastern forest, past the twelfth tree from the Magical Stone.
Search the ruins and retrieve the ancient artifact. Be wary of traps and guardians.
